
```{r}

#Librerias
library(dummies)
library(caret)
library(rpart)
library(e1071)
```

```{r}

#Database
data<- read.csv("train.csv")
str(data) 
Porcentaje<-0.7
set.seed(123)
data$Class <- as.factor(ifelse(C$SalePrice >= 250000, "Caras", ifelse(C$SalePrice >= 500000, "Intermedia", "Economica")))
Datos <- cbind(data, dummy(data$Class,verbose = T))
Datos <- Datos[,c(5,15,25,35,45,55,65,75,85)]
Datos <- Datos[,colSums(is.na(Datos))==0]
A <- sample(nrow(data), nrow(data)*Porcentaje)
train <- data[A, ]
test <- data[-A, ]
```

#Modelos

#Economicas
```{r}
Modelo_Economicas <- glm(Economicas~., data = train[,c(1:7,13)],family = binomial(),maxit = 100)
Modelo_Economicas
```

#Medias
```{r}
Modelo_Medias <- glm(Medias~., data = train[,c(1:7,13)],family = binomial(),maxit = 100)
Modelo_Medias
```

#Caras 
```{r}
Modelo_Caras <- glm(Caras~., data = train[,c(1:7,13)],family = binomial(),maxit = 100)
Modelo_Caras
```
